entry.title: Friday night: Wet flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Wet flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
